Text:
alright footy love ya work man.
Is there any chance you can upload this weekends MOTD 1&2 really miss ya uploads dude from all of us out here in Thailand.
Cheers

Hi Footy, any chance we can get the on board from last weeks Japanese GP? Been looking everywhere and can`t find. Thanks for all your hard work. I don`t have good F 1 coverage where I live. You are a life saver!!!!!
Thanks for the upload, by the way the Japanese Grand Prix, I can not find anyone knows where to find it?
